title: Brett Herron
text:
Brett Herron (born 13 November 1995) is an <a href="England">English</a> professional <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player who currently plays for <a href="Biarritz%20Olympique">Biarritz Olympique</a> in <a href="Top%2014">Top 14</a>.
Herron signed for Ulster from <a href="Bath%20Rugby">Bath</a> in 2016. On 9 March 2018, Herron left Ulster to join <a href="Jersey%20Reds">Jersey Reds</a> in the <a href="RFU%20Championship">RFU Championship</a> from the 2018–19 season.
On 22 March 2019, Herron returned to the <a href="Premiership%20Rugby">Gallagher Premiership</a> to sign for <a href="Harlequin%20F.C.">Harlequins</a> from the 2019–20 season. 
In 2021, he signs for <a href="Biarritz%20Olympique">Biarritz olympique</a> in <a href="Top%2014">Top 14</a>.
